channel.title: Canadian Motocross Radio
channel.itunes:author: Said and Done
channel.description: CMR is a live, fan-interactive, web based radio show dealing specifically with the Canadian Motocross Championships the teams, the riders, the Players of this dramatic international motocross series. CMR is produced and hosted by the voice of Canadian Motocross Marc Travers and co-hosted by Mr. MX Colour Brian Koster, with updates from Notorious G Ryan Gauld. This dynamic threesome has been delivering the Canadian Nationals for international television audiences for the last six years. Each program offers complete race reviews and previews, interviews with the previous days race winners, special in-studio guests and set up for next weeks races.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Canada's only all access web based talk radio show tailored specifically for professional Canadian Motocross.
channel.itunes:summary: CMR is a live, fan-interactive, web based radio show dealing specifically with the Canadian Motocross Championships the teams, the riders, the Players of this dramatic international motocross series. CMR is produced and hosted by the voice of Canadian Motocross Marc Travers and co-hosted by Mr. MX Colour Brian Koster, with updates from Notorious G Ryan Gauld. This dynamic threesome has been delivering the Canadian Nationals for international television audiences for the last six years. Each program offers complete race reviews and previews, interviews with the previous days race winners, special in-studio guests and set up for next weeks races.
